column4: can somebody help me....i'm on maverick now and all i see is a huge windows and everything displayed like monster
and i'm currently using the safemode to be able to login with the username i created on install
adjust your resolution,.
i can't
why dont you start with normal boot?
i boot using normal mode until the login screen appears. put in the username i just created on installation and password. then ubuntu pop the login screen back
now if i use the opption safe mode when i'm on the login screen, then i could get inside ubuntu but with this awful resolution.
system -> administration -> login screen settings
set log in as  automatically
i tried that before, it wont even loged in.
how to repair xorg?
do you ever try with startx?
i'm sorry to say this, but what is startx?
login normally.. press ALT+CTRL+2 when you at your login screen.. then login thru console.. after that type startx or gdm start
ok hold on i restart first
startx failed
oh, sorry..i think there's problem with xorg
any idea how to solve that?
did you get any error msg? while trying to use startx?
had you try add another user and login with new user account?
yes. same thing.
it's suppose to work..even with my old p4 machine.
not your fault tho.
yea.. try sudo service gdm start
